topic.title: How to change the title on zerotalk clone? it seems if I directly modify the index.html file, then it will not work properly, for example eitherf the content.json or the index.html will not be downloadable by other visitors. Thank you so much for your attention and help.

1_16vF6er1HXSbLP4s8zzs6xthTmzrq6vRDz.body:
> [david](#comment_1_15WPKoXwHMPcPvciHw3N12MxrYWsWD7WVp): Maybe this works: 
> 
> Go to your site 
> Click and drag the grey 0-button (in the top right corner) to the left
> Scroll down to "SITE TITLE" 
> Enter a new title 
> 
> I haven't tested this.


Thank you very much and your help is very helpful and much appreciated.
